DOC.brief_title: WEI NASAL JET The Sedation Outpatient Upper Gastrointestinal Endoscopy
DOC.criteria: patient undergo upper gastrointestinal endoscopy age 18 year old Signed informed consent form blood coagulation dysfunction tendency nose bleed clear diagnosis heart disease ( heart failure , angina , myocardial infarction , arrhythmia , etc . ) clear diagnosis lung disease ( asthma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , pulmonary embolism , pulmonary edema , lung cancer ) pregnant liver disease kidney disease increase intracranial pressure emergency operation multiple trauma American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) Physical Status classification IV mouth , nose throat infection
